content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been created or updated in the latest steps.

### ERROR TIPS
- **Inventory Full When Crafting**: The agent repeatedly attempted to craft wooden chests but failed due to a full inventory. Despite dropping items, the inventory remained full, indicating the agent did not free up enough space. Ensure sufficient inventory slots are available before attempting to craft items.
- **Inefficient Inventory Management**: The agent dropped items multiple times but failed to free up enough space for crafting. Consider dropping more items or using storage containers to manage inventory more effectively.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables were defined or invoked in the latest steps.
